title: Travel Diaries | Spiti Valley: Snow-Capped Peaks, Ancient Monasteries, Rugged Landscapes, High-Altitude Adventures

title: India records highest ever non fossil capacity addition in current financial year
description: In a remarkable stride towards sustainability, India has unveiled a staggering 31.25 GW of non-fossil energy capacity this fiscal year, with solar energy spearheading the revolution. Over the past eleven years, the solar sector has experienced an unprecedented surge of 4,500%, positioning India as a crucial contender in the global clean energy landscape.

title: Local authority votes unanimously to bin its ancient ‘men-only’ honour
description: A local authority binned a centuries-old tradition of hereditary freedom of the city because it could only be passed down by men.
